New Records: Toni Kroos played a vertical ball into Florian Wirtz, who scored within seven seconds of kick-off.
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored the opening goal for Germany within seven seconds of kick-off.
Kai Havertz scored Germany's second goal after a brilliant setup by Jamal Musiala.
Brice Samba made three crucial saves towards the end of the match to restrict the damage to just two goals.
Pre-Game Insights: This was Didier Deschamps' 150th game managing Les Bleus.
France's penultimate match before this summer’s Euros.
Post-Match Reflections: Boos rang around the stadium at full-time, indicating dissatisfaction with France's performance.
Aurélien Tchouaméni analyzed France’s defeat, stating 'We were outclassed in every department'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fans at the Groupama Stadium in Lyon chanted for changes during the second half.
Germany's Max Mittelstädt tested Brice Samba with a shot destined for the bottom corner.
